chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: lb

Goal:
⟘ :: l ⪯ nil -> l ⪯ nil

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Notation lb := (list bool)
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil
lb_mask_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
lb_mask_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> P l nil -> P (⟘ :: l) nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⪯ l0 -> P l l0
in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m
in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l
Ascii.N_of_digits = fix N_of_digits (l : lb) : BinNums.N := match l with | nil => BinNums.N0 | b :: l' => BinNat.N.add (if b then BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH else BinNums.N0) (BinNat.N.mul (BinNums.Npos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) (N_of_digits l')) end : lb -> BinNums.N Arguments Ascii.N_of_digits _%list_scope
Ring.bool_ring_ring_lemma2 : forall (n : nat) (lH : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr bool * Ring_polynom.PExpr bool)) (l : lb), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) eq (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l lH ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe = Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) ⟘ ⟙ Ring.bool_eq (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) (Ring_theory.get_sign_None (C:=bool)) l npe
Ring.bool_ring_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr bool * Ring_polynom.PExpr bool)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr bool), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) eq (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval ⟘ ⟙ xorb andb xorb (fun b : bool => b) (Ring_theory.IDphi (R:=bool)) Ring_theory.id_phi_N (Ring_theory.pow_N ⟙ andb) l pe2
partition_cons2 : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (a : A) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> f a = ⟘ -> partition f (a :: l) = (l1, a :: l2)
app_removelast_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), l <> nil -> l = removelast l ++ last l d :: nil
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Forall_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> SProp), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Forall_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (Q : list A -> Type), Q nil -> (forall (b : A) (l : list A), P b -> Q (b :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> Q l
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Tauto.map_simpl : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = match l with | nil => nil | a :: l0 => f a :: map f l0 end
map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = nil -> l = nil
incl_l_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), incl l nil -> l = nil
app_eq_nil : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l ++ l' = nil -> l = nil /\ l' = nil
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup nil | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)
Inductive ForallOrdPairs (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := FOP_nil : ForallOrdPairs R nil | FOP_cons : forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> ForallOrdPairs R (a :: l) Arguments ForallOrdPairs [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments FOP_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments FOP_cons [A]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Exists_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
list_max_lt : forall (l : list nat) (n : nat), l <> nil -> list_max l < n < -> Forall (fun k : nat => k < n) l
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') Arguments Forall2 [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Forall2_nil [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall2_cons [A B]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _ [l l']%list_scope
map_last : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (a : A), map f (l ++ a :: nil) = map f l ++ f a :: nil

intros H1.
intro H2.
inversion H2.
```
